data.title: 2024 LA County Fair Competitions: Showcase Your Talent!
data.meta_description: Enter the 2024 LA County Fair Competitions! From home arts to culinary to agriculture, showcase your skills. Join us for a celebration of talent and community.
data.text:
Welcome to the 2024 LA County Fair Horticulture Show Online Entries

Please read the Competition Showbook and Fairplex Code of Conduct for rules and regulations before proceeding with online entry.

Important Dates and Information:

2024 LA County Fair Horticulture Competition Showbook

Fairplex Code of Conduct

2024 LA County Fair Horticulture Waiver

W-9 & 2024 LA COUNTY FAIR HORTICULTURE WAIVER:

Please note all exhibitors are required to fill out a W-9 with all the correct information. This data will be used to send out exhibitor premium checks to the correct address. Along with the W-9 all exhibitors will be required to download the 2024 LA County Fair Horticulture Waiver, fill it out, save it and upload it into their Showorks entry when prompted to after they have filled out their W-9.

Sessions expire and automatically log off after 20 minutes of inactivity. Ensure you click “Save Cart” if you plan on leaving the computer for more than 20 minutes.

TO CREATE AN ACCOUNT:

You will need to create a new account/password for the 2024 Fair (accounts from previous years are no longer active).

Click “Sign In” in the top right corner, then “choose a type” – “Exhibitor.”

Limit passwords to letters and numbers; no special characters. Passwords are case sensitive.

TO CREATE AN ENTRY:

Click the dropdown menu arrow to choose the “Department” and “Division”. Select the “Class”. Enter any additional entry information. Follow the on-screen instructions to create additional entries.

W-9 & 2024 LA COUNTY FAIR HORTICULTURE WAIVER:

Please note all exhibitors are required to fill out a W-9 with all the correct information. This data will be used to send out exhibitor premium checks to the correct address. Along with the W-9 all exhibitors will be required to download the 2024 LA County Fair Horticulture Waiver, fill it out, save it and upload it into their Showorks entry when prompted to after they have filled out their W-9.

PROCESSING FEES:

If applicable, processing fees are required to be paid online by credit card. Use VISA, MASTER CARD, DISCOVER or AMEX

If you have any questions, please contact:

Sasha Turnbull:

turnbull@fairplex.com

Thank you for your participation!

Click here to enter the ShoWorks Portal.

If you have any questions, please contact:

Sasha Turnbull:

turnbull@fairplex.com

Thank you for your participation!

Click here to enter the ShoWorks Portal.

Check out our new competitions: Stars, Stripes & Fun Quilt Block, Glass, Wreaths & LEGO®

Step 1: Please read the competition information, individual rules for each competition and general entry rules before entering online.

Step 2: Enter Online by February 15, 2024.

You must enter online prior to dropping off your entry, no exceptions. We will no longer be accepting mail in entry forms.

Step 3: Drop off entries on Saturday, March 2, 2024 between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. No entries will be accepted after 5:00 p.m. If you are unable to drop off your entry, you can send someone in your place or mail your item. This is the only day entries will be accepted.

Entry drop off is located at the LA County Fair – 1101 W. McKinley Ave. Pomona, CA 91768. Please enter through Gate 17 at the intersection of Fairplex Dr. and McKinley Ave and then proceed to the Home Arts Building.

If you are mailing in your entries they must be received by 4:00 p.m. on Thursday, February 29, 2024. Please include a duplicate copy of your online entry receipt with your shipment. Entries can be mailed to: LA County Fair / Home Arts, 1101 W. McKinley Ave., Pomona, CA 91768

Step 4: Visit your entries on display here at the LA County Fair. All entries will be on display from May 3, 2024 – May 27, 2024, closed Mondays (except Memorial Day), Tuesdays, and Wednesdays.

Step 5: Pick up entries on Tuesday, June 4, 2024 from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. This is the ONLY day for pick up. Unclaimed items will be donated to non-profit charities. Bring your claim checks with you. If your claim checks are lost, you must show photo identification before we will release your items. If you are unable to pick up your items you must send someone in your place. Please send them with your claim checks. If they do not have your claim checks you must either call or email our office by 4:00pm Monday, June 3 so we can put them on the item pick up list. The person picking up your items must have photo identification.

Pick up is located at the LA County Fair – 1101 W. McKinley Ave. Pomona, CA 91768. Please enter through Gate 17 at the intersection of Fairplex Dr. and McKinley Ave. and then proceed to the Home Arts Building.

Tips for completing your online entry form:

One entry per line only.

For example, if you are entering an outfit that includes a hat, dress and booties, each item would need to be placed on its own line so that a tag is made for each item.

Entry must be made under the name of the individual whose exhibit it is. Your entry tag will reflect this. No business or fictitious names.

Under the section marked “Description” please indicate the color, type or pattern of your entry.

For example, if it is a quilt you can write the pattern name, or the color of the quilt, just a basic brief description.

Division and class numbers needed to complete your online entry can be found below under each competition category (for example, under Arts & Crafts, Quilting, etc.) and must be indicated on your entry or it will not be processed.

Download the Important Information Page here

DOWNLOAD THE ENTRY RULES HERE

Featured Competitions & Contests

For a complete description of each competition category, including division and class numbers, please click on the category below.

Arts & Crafts

Clothing & Textiles

Costume – Costumer’s Guild West, Inc.

Manga, Anime, Video Game, Science Fiction, Fantasy, Theatrical, Historical, Halloween

Developmental & Physical Disabilities

Doorscaping Contest – Competition is now closed. Please contact the Competition Coordinator to join the waitlist.

Help a Child Smile

Jewelry

LEGO® – Space is limited! Enter now

Needle Art

Photography

Pottery

Quilting

If you purchased a 2024 Quilt Block you must email or mail in your entry form by February 15, 2024. Quilt Block either needs to be delivered on Saturday, March 2, 2024 between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. or if mailing, it must be received by 4:00 p.m. on Thursday, February 29, 2024.

Purchase your 2025 Quilt Block at the Fair.

Enter Competitions

If you have any questions or need help with the online registration, contact Chris Stoner at 909-865-4232 or stoner@fairplex.com

Competitions for Ages 5-17 years old

Entries accepted from individuals only.

Check out our new competition: Polymer Clay

Step 1: Please read the competition information, individual rules for each competition and general entry rules before entering online.

Step 2: Enter Online by February 15, 2024.

You must enter online prior to dropping off your entry, no exceptions. We will no longer be accepting mail in entry forms.

Step 3: Drop off entries on Saturday, March 2, 2024 between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. No entries will be accepted after 5:00 p.m. If you are unable to drop off your entry, you can send someone in your place or mail your item. This is the only day entries will be accepted.

Entry drop off is located at the LA County Fair – 1101 W. McKinley Ave. Pomona, CA 91768. Please enter through Gate 17 at the intersection of Fairplex Dr. and McKinley Ave. and then proceed to the Home Arts Building.

If you are mailing in your entries they must be received by 4:00 p.m. on Thursday, February 29, 2024. Please include a duplicate copy of your online entry receipt with your shipment. Entries can be mailed to: LA County Fair / Home Arts, 1101 W. McKinley Ave., Pomona, CA 91768

Step 4: Visit your entries on display here at the LA County Fair. All entries will be on display from May 3, 2024 – May 27, 2024, closed Mondays (except Memorial Day), Tuesdays, and Wednesdays.

Step 5: Pick up entries on Tuesday, June 4, 2024 from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. This is the ONLY day for pick up. Unclaimed items will be donated to non-profit charities. Bring your claim checks with you. If your claim checks are lost, you must show photo identification before we will release your items. If you are unable to pick up your items you must send someone in your place. Please send them with your claim checks. If they do not have your claim checks you must either call or email our office by 4:00pm Monday, June 3 so we can put them on the item pick up list. The person picking up your items must have photo identification.

Pick up is located at the LA County Fair – 1101 W. McKinley Ave. Pomona, CA 91768. Please enter through Gate 17 at the intersection of Fairplex Dr. and McKinley Ave and then proceed to the Home Arts Building.

Tips for completing your entry form:

One entry per line only.

For example, if you are entering 2 wood items, each item would need to be placed on its own line so that a tag is made for each item.

Entry must be made under the name of the individual whose exhibit it is. Your entry tag will reflect this. No fictitious names. Parent/Guardian please make sure you register with your child’s first and last name and not a parent/guardian name.

Under the section marked “Description” please indicate the color, type or size of your entry.

For example, if you are entering a painting, on the description line put “yellow flowers” or “horse and boots”. Just a basic brief description.

Division and class numbers needed to complete your online entry can be found below under each competition category (for example, under Arts & Crafts, Quilting, etc.) and must be indicated on your entry or it will not be processed.

Download the Important Information Page here

Download the Entry Rules here

For a complete description of each competition category, including division and class numbers, please click on the category below.
